required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Investigate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics of ALZ002 DS in Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study, to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of Single and Multiple Ascending Doses (SAD-MAD) of ALZ002 DS in Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of single-ascending and multiple-ascending doses of ALZ002 DS.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of SAEs and treatment-related adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Study Completion (up to Day 14)
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of SAEs and treatment-related severe AEs

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum Plasma Concentration (Cmax) will be assessed
secondary_outcome.time_frame: predose, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 24 hours postdose; Day 3: predose; Day 4:predose; Day 5:predose; Day 6: predose; Day7: predose, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 24 hours postdose

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Curve (AUC) will be assessed
secondary_outcome.time_frame: predose, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 24 hours postdose; Day 3: predose; Day 4:predose; Day 5:predose; Day 6: predose; Day7: predose, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 24 hours postdose
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve

other_outcome.measure: Plasma MicroRNA (miRNA) concentration will be measured
other_outcome.time_frame: predose; Day 2: predose; Day 4:predose; Day7: predose; Day 14
other_outcome.description: Plasma miRNA concentration versus time curve

arm_group.description: SAD: 6 cohorts of subjects are planned to be orally dosed, ranging from 15 mg - 800 mg. MAD: 3 cohorts of subjects are planned to be orally dosed once daily for 7 consecutive days, ranging from 300 mg - 800 mg.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy male and/or non-childbearing potential female subjects, non-smoker (no use of tobacco or nicotine products within 3 months prior to screening), ≥18 and ≤55 years of age at screening.
- Body mass index > 18.5 and < 30.0 kg/m2, and body weight ≥ 50.0 kg for males and ≥ 45.0 kg for females at screening visit.
- Capable of consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any clinically significant abnormality or abnormal laboratory test results
- Positive urine drug screen, alcohol breath test, or urine cotinine test
- History of significant allergic reactions to any drug.
- Participation in a clinical research study involving the administration of an investigational or marketed drug or device
- History of clinically significant opportunistic infection
- Presence of fever (body temperature > 38°C)
